com.hazelcast.cache.impl.nearcache.impl.record

Class AbstractNearCacheRecord<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.cache.impl.nearcache.impl.record.AbstractNearCacheRecord<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - the type of the value stored by this AbstractNearCacheRecord
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    NearCacheRecord<V>, Evictable, Expirable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NearCacheDataRecord, NearCacheObjectRecord

    public abstract class AbstractNearCacheRecord<V>
extends Object
implements NearCacheRecord<V>
    Abstract implementation of NearCacheRecord with value and expiration time as internal state.

        Description copied from interface: NearCacheRecord
